perturbation.changed_text:
11.1 Term. This Agreement shall be effective as of January 1, 2012 (the “Effective Date”), provided, however, that, ARTICLE XII and
ARTICLE XIII shall not be effective until after the Closing. The initial term of this Agreement shall begin on the Effective Date and continue for
three (3) years, subject to the prior termination rights provided below. At the end of such initial term, and any renewed term, as applicable, this
Agreement may renew for an additional one (1) year term, with or without notice. The decision to renew will be solely at the discretion of Moelis Holdings.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specified an automatic renewal unless notice was provided, but the modified version implies that Moelis Holdings can choose to renew or not regardless of any notice. This introduces conflict about the renewal terms, as it is now uncertain whether it needs explicit agreement or auto-renews.

4.1	General	Allocation.	The	parties	agree	to	share	fees	50%/50%	on	assignments	within	the	scope	of	this	Agreement	set	forth	in	Section	3.1
where	SMBC	or	Nikko,	on	the	one	hand,	and	Moelis	Holdings,	on	the	other	hand,	are	jointly	retained	as	co-advisors	by	a	Client	for	such
assignments,	except	as	otherwise	mutually	agreed	with	respect	to	a	specific	matter	by	the	parties.	The	parties	agree	that	the	parties	will	generally
seek	to	be	jointly	retained	as	co-advisors	by	a	Client	on	assignments	within	the	scope	of	this	Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.1 General Allocation. The parties may share fees on assignments within the scope of this Agreement set forth in Section 3.1. The fee allocation will be determined on a case-by-case basis, and there is no obligation to share fees 50%/50%. The parties agree that there is no obligation to be jointly retained as co-advisors by a Client on assignments within the scope of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text established a clear 50/50 fee sharing arrangement. This was changed to remove the certainty of fee sharing. This change undermines the certainty of the fee sharing, making it an unpredictable arrangement. This contradicts the clear fee arrangement detailed at the start of the section.

perturbation.original_text:
3.1 Scope. Subject to the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement and to the extent permitted by pre-existing arrangements of
either party, SMBC/Nikko, on the one hand, and Moelis Holdings, on the other hand, shall use their commercially reasonable best efforts to work
together on Covered Businesses involving Japanese Companies where all principal parties involved are located within Covered Regions. The
Strategic Alliance shall continue to be non-exclusive.
perturbation.changed_text:
3.1 Scope. Subject to the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement and to the extent permitted by pre-existing arrangements of
either party, SMBC/Nikko, on the one hand, and Moelis Holdings, on the other hand, may choose to work together at their own discretion. The
Strategic Alliance shall continue to be exclusive to Moelis Holdings.
perturbation.explanation: By changing "shall use their commercially reasonable best efforts" to "may choose to work together at their own discretion" creates contradiction because there is not now any required level of obligation. Furthermore, by changing "non-exclusive" to "exclusive to Moelis Holdings" it creates a contradiction in the agreement on whether other parties can work with those covered by this agreement.
